page.title: 12Blaenau Gwent Workshops
page.content:
{BLAENAU GWENT WORKSHOPS} The area's historical connection with the iron industry is now only to be found with the Blaenau Gwent Workshops run by the British Steel Corporation. {Firms run by the BSC in the area:
H&M ENGINEERING Engineering GILWERN AUTOMATICS Servicing Amusement Machines & Organs C W GROOM HARPSICHORDS Harpsichords, Spinets & Clavichords K&S CRAFTS Soft Toys & Household Goods J&J SECRETARIAL SERVICIES Typing Agency IAN NICHOLSON & CO LTD Office Equipment & Partitioning USK VALLEY ENGINEERING Design Draughtsmen DAVES STUDIOS Printer K A P S Food Processors
